predicate.note: Frames file for 'participate' based on sentences in financial subcorpus. No access to verbnet. No comparison.

example.name: typically transitive
example.text: Upjohn officials said they couldn't estimate the size of the charge until they determine which employees, and how many, *trace* will participate in the retirement plan.

example.name: oddly intransitive
example.text: ``There are too many people participating,'' says Al Ries, of Trout & Ries, a Greenwich, Conn., marketing consulting firm.
